name: mikroe.click.lightranger11
short_description: LightRanger 11 Click is a compact add-on board suitable for range-finding and distance-sensing applications. This board features the VL53L7CX, a time-of-flight 8x8 multizone ranging sensor from STMicroelectronics. It is a fast and accurate multizone distance-ranging sensor width of 90Â° wide FoV. The multizone-ranging output with either 4x4 or 8x8 separate zones, width multitarget detection, and distance measurement in each zone. As a multizone-ranging device, its range is only up to 350cm.
